item.description:
Where is your soul and how will you find it? Who will take you there? Everywhere you turn, you hear the "soul" mentioned; people looking for their "soul mates" and trying to discover who they are as souls. All the while, the nature and location of the soul remain unknown to so many; but not to all. At this seminar, Father Peter will awaken within you the truth about the soul, which will leave you with a clear understanding that will springboard you into a real search that will lead to real discovery.

Suggested Donation $35 • Light Lunch Included


Father Peter Bowes is an ordained Priest and Master Teacher in the Order of Christ/Sophia. Father Peter, aside from being a Master Teacher, has also been called an “Internet Guru” for his growing online presence in social media avenues such as YouTube, Facebook, 12seconds.tv, StickAM and Twitter. His teachings are also available via podcasts on AskFatherPeter.com and on his blog, The Mystical Path, which has gained a loyal following.

Every week of the year, Father Peter travels nationally to give lectures and seminars on the Christian mystical inner path. Also an author, he has written and published several books, entitled The Word Within, The Radical Path, and Spiritual Astrology. Currently, he devotes his time to teaching and writing lectures and songs. A prolific musician and songwriter, Father Peter now has eleven albums on the market (visit www.SophiaRadio.com to hear Father Peter's music).

Father Peter received his Masters and Doctoral degrees from Indiana University in Educational Psychology and practiced psychology for many years. He has two grown daughters and lives in Chicago.
item.name: Soul Searching with Father Peter
